data.name: Base64DecodeDescription
data.value: Decodes a piece of Base64 encoded text.

data.name: Base64DecodeHelp
data.value: Usage: - base64decode ZGVjb2RlIHRoaXM= - base64decode --input ZGVjb2RlIHRoaXM=

data.name: Base64EncodeDescription
data.value: Encodes a piece of text or a file to a Base64 string.

data.name: Base64EncodeHelp
data.value: Usage: - base64encode encode this - base64encode --input encode this

data.name: FilextDescription
data.value: Lets you fill in a file extension and looks up the corresponding information of that file extension.

data.name: FilextHelp
data.value: Usage: - filext xlsx

data.name: FilextResult
FromMimeDescription
data.value: Checks a given MIME type and finds all corresponding file extensions.

data.name: FromMimeHelp
data.value: Usage: - frommime text/plain

data.name: LipsumDescription
data.value: Generates a number of Lorem Ipsum paragraphs.

data.name: LipsumHelp
data.value:
Usage: - lipsum - lipsum --paragraphs 20
Optional properties: - paragraphs: the number of Lorem Ipsum paragrahps (5 default).

data.name: LongurlDescription
data.value: A handy tool to lengthen URLs from several (not all) URL shortening services. Works with (at least): - bit.ly - goo.gl - is.gd - tinyurl.com - t.co - fb.me

data.name: LongurlHelp
data.value: Usage: - longurl http://tinyurl.com/123

data.name: Md5Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to an MD5 hash.

data.name: Md5Help
data.value:
Usage: - md5 hash this - md5 --input hash thi - md5 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the MD5 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: Sha1Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to a SHA1 hash.

data.name: Sha1Help
data.value:
Usage: - sha1 hash this - sha1 --input hash this - sha1 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the MD5 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: Sha256Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to a SHA256 hash.

data.name: Sha256Help
data.value:
Usage: - sha256 hash this - sha256 --input hash this - sha256 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the SHA256 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: Sha384Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to a SHA384 hash.

data.name: Sha384Help
data.value:
Usage: - sha384 hash this - sha384 --input hash this - sha384 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the SHA384 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: Sha512Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to a SHA512 hash.

data.name: Sha512Help
data.value:
Usage: - sha512 hash this - sha512 --input hash this - sha512 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the SHA512 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: StringreverseDescription
data.value: This tool lets you reverse a string.

data.name: StringreverseHelp
data.value: Usage: - stringreverse Reverse this string my man.

data.name: TinyUrlDescription
data.value: A handy tool to generate shortened URLs at tinyurl.com.

data.name: TinyUrlHelp
data.value: Usage: - tinyurl https://google.com

data.name: ToMimeDescription
data.value: Converts a given file extension or file name to the corresponding MIME type.

data.name: ToMimeHelp
data.value: Usage: - tomime txt - tomime filename.txt

data.name: UrlencodeDescription
data.value: A simple tool to URL encode a given string.

data.name: UrlencodeHelp
data.value: Usage: - urlencode https://www.google.com

data.name: UuidDescription
data.value: A handy tool to generate a (or many) UUIDs.

data.name: UuidHelp
data.value:
Usage: - uuid - uuid --brackets true --uppercase true --hyphens true --howmany 1
Optional properties: - brackets: whether the GUIDs should be surrounded by brackets (true or false, default false) - uppercase: whether the GUIDs should be uppercase (true or false, default false) - hyphens: whether the GUID parts should be separated by hyphens (true or false, default true) - howmany: how many GUIDs should be generated (default 1)

data.name: WeeknumberDescription
data.value: A tool which shows the current week number.

data.name: WeeknumberHelp
data.value: Usage: - weeknumber

data.name: WriteQrDescription
data.value: A handy tool to generate QR codes.

data.name: WriteQrHelp
data.value:
Usage: - writeqr --input this is the QR content --outputFile C:\temp\qr.png --width 250 --height 250
Optional properties: - width: the PNG file width in pixels (default 250) - height: the PNG height in pixels (default 250) - openFile: whether the file should be opened after saving (true or false, default false)
